tips.text: Get a taste of Indonesian crispy fried duck here!

formattedAddress: Isetan Supermarket. Shaw House. 350 Orchard Road
location.address: Isetan Supermarket. Shaw House. 350 Orchard Road

tips.text: Must catch their warm  gorgeously fluffy $1 corn buns during their designated baking timing. #ThomtoriEats
Самые вкусные в мире Дим самы! Если вы приехали в Сингапур, то это место нужно посетить обязательно!!!👍
Soo expensive ($80 for 16 macarons) but soooo yummy.  I'm hooked on their salted caramel, of course!  Come often enough, be super nice to the staff and they may sneak in their 20% staff discount.
Sushi lunch box is fresh, nice, tasty and can be eaten in a cosy and peaceful atmosphere (see the back room)
Aburi Salmon Roll is a must order here!
Wonderfully talented chef & team!
A wide range of Japanese restaurant serving ramen, teppanyaki, soba, izakaya, etc.

formattedAddress: Japan Food Town (@ Level 4 Wisma Atria) (435 Orchard Road)
location.address: Japan Food Town (@ Level 4 Wisma Atria)

tips.text: Going back! Great variations on Saba fish!
Very good French fare at reasonable price.  Tried many of their dishes and so far they are all great!

venue.name: Sun With Moon Japanese Dining & Café

tips.text: the tofu cheesecake is nice, very smooth.
Old school but just like wine, the older the better! :-) My favorite is the crab cakes! Crunchy on the outside but tender on the inside. You can order half portion if it's too much!
Choose from two new 5-course Set Lunch menus that are perfect for a casual lunch with friends or a meeting with business associates. Menus are available at S$48++ per person.
The service here is damn lousy, no basic courtesy. Full of untrained PRC.
The best Nasi Padang in town, although a little bit difficult to find, but it's so worthed when you finally find the place! Should try the beef rendang, ayam panggang, beef dendeng with green chilli!
Must try the original flavor pudding.
Great place to people watch with TBB's usual delicious croissant. Hmm
Tasty yakitori bento lunch set...
Nice churro but icecream so so
The Tofu Salad's yumz

tips.text: Better than crystal jade kitchen in my opinion

tips.text: Ask for your mentaiko baguette to be sliced; makes eating it as a snack a LOT easier.
Best service I've had in a while, kudos to the wait staff! 
Brunch burger left me unimpressed: questionable choice of ingredients (2cm thick onion ring, really?) and very bland patty, basically tasteless. Desserts, on the other hand, are top-notch.

formattedAddress: #01-04 Marriott Singapore Tang Plaza (320 Orchard Road)

tips.text: Toro sushi is grilled by hot charcoal to reduce greesy flavor. To fully enjoy the taste of fatty tuna, a request must be made in advance to be served otherwise.

venue.name: Ya Kun Kaya Toast 亞坤

tips.text: Coffee and bread are addictive, unfortunately the place is small.
Cocktails are great!
Bentos during lunch hours are great for everyone to start enjoying great Japanese food here. They also serve lunches on weekends!

formattedAddress: 5th Level, Terrace Wing, Grand Hyatt Singapore (10 Scotts Road)
location.address: 5th Level, Terrace Wing, Grand Hyatt Singapore

tips.text: Weekend BBQ buffet with endless flow of prosecco, margaritas, beers, juices and soft drinks! Not to mention the bbq lamb, beef, sausages, prawns n a whole lot more! *BURP*
At the risk of sounding unimaginative- best duck I've eaten in my life

formattedAddress: Japan Food Town (Lv 4, Wisma Atria) (435 Orchard Road)

tips.text: Hot thin udon & the tempura is awesome
Lunch sets are awesome! Had the chirashi don and it was so fresh with thick slices of sashimi.
小龙包 FTW!! 

tips.text: The degustation menu is awesome!
Geoduck, short ribs, blue trout, prawn made noodles
The tori miso ramen has a crazy rich broth. You'll want to take a nap after.
Orders are taken at the counter not at the seats.

tips.text: Great food, big portions, yummy curry sauce! Worth repeat visits!!!
please try "signature pork slice" here it is highly recommended
It takes a lot more than extreme patience.
Try the Gyoza! Very nice!
This place just opened, you've got to try the banana musovado loaf with peanut butter frosting and chocolate olive oil cupcakes!
New concept in Hilton Singapore featuring interesting Asian takes on cocktails and grill items
absolutely excellent tapas & equally superb service. suckling pig, seafood paella & asturia seafood stew were stars of our dinner. all our dishes were awesome & we were served lamb chops FoC! bravo
Good service, good ambience, good food. Reasonably priced too. What not to like? Do not miss the steam dumplings and crab with glutinous rice.
Every 1st Wednesday 15%off / 25%off pokka card member.
Try the chicken + spaghetti meal! :) We were there during the first opening day!
